name: Killer Freaks from Outer Space
description:
Killer Freaks from Outer Space is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Montpellier.
You can play Killer Freaks from Outer Space on Wii U.
It was produced by Guillaume Brunier. Florent Sacré and Jean Philippe Caro directed the game. It was scored by Cris Velasco.
